properties.value: You can create tiles and use them as buttons:

These screens are built with the web-based screen designer. Here here you can drag images from the left to the central stage. You can convert them to buttons/sensors/... by dropping a control from the right onto them.
It is meant to show you the possibilities with YourHome. Go to www.yourhomeapp.net to learn more!
Or even add your own floorplan!
You can show readings of sensors:
Click on the lights to control them
Add your IP cameras - Wherever you like!
Connect to Spotify, Google Music or your own music library
Or listen to your favourite radio stations
Interested in controlling your house like this?
